name: Garlic Bread
description: Crispy golden bread baked to perfection, brushed with rich garlic butter and herbs.

name: Garlic Bread Stuffed
description: Golden, crispy bread loaded with sweet corns and a burst of garlic butter — every bite is a warm hug for your taste buds.

name: Heart-Shaped Waffle with Belgian Chocolate Sauce
description: Fluffy heart-shaped waffle drizzled with rich, velvety Belgian chocolate — love at first bite!

name: Heart-Shaped Waffle with Milky Bar Sauce
description: Soft waffle hearts topped with silky white Milky Bar sauce — sweet, creamy, and simply dreamy.

name: Heart-Shaped Waffle with Dark Chocolate Sauce
description: Crisp waffle hearts drenched in bold dark chocolate — a bittersweet romance on your plate.

name: Cupcake
description: Moist, fluffy, and topped with creamy frosting — a little bite of happiness that melts in your mouth.

name: White Sauce Pasta
description: Pasta tossed in a rich, cheesy white sauce with herbs — creamy, comforting, and totally irresistible.

name: Veg Steam Momos
description: Soft, delicate dumplings packed with a flavorful mix of garden-fresh veggies, steamed to perfection. Served hot, light.
